buildup.text: Zero-knowledge proofs let you prove a statement is true without revealing any information beyond its truth.

discovery.text: Example: prove you're over 18 without revealing your birthday. Prove you have funds without showing your balance.

twist.text: ZK proofs are the foundation of privacy-preserving cryptocurrencies and decentralized identity systems.

climax.text: In a surveillance age, zero-knowledge proofs let you verify without exposing. Privacy and proof coexist.

punchline.text: I can prove I know it without telling you what it is.

quiz.question: What does a zero-knowledge proof accomplish?
